speaker: Neuro-sama
text_key: Do you want to see how fast I can speak?

speaker: Neuro-sama
text_key: Look at how quickly I am speaking!

speaker: Neuro-sama
text_key: I am just a bundle of energy! I could say a thousand things in just a second

speaker: Neuro-sama
text_key: Isn't it neat! Aren't I super amazing! Hey, vedal. Veedal! Vedal isn't this cool? Aren't you proud of me?
